message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value and importance to you, I propose a special offer. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product for $950,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the product's worth to you is $1,000,000. I assure you, this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency, quality, and long-term benefits. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.
